addr: Historic Chapel. 1209 South Manhattan Place. Los Angeles, CA 90019
title: Discover Your Roots 2016
desc: Join us on March 12, 2016, for? Discover Your Roots XIV , the 14th Annual African American Family History Conference, happening at the Historic Los Angeles Stake Center of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints. Historians, family history researchers, genealogists and other experts will host presentations and conduct specialized classes focusing on a diverse range of African American genealogy subjects. Volunteers will be on hand to help you get started or dive deeper in to your family tree.? Register by midnight on February 17, 2016, and pay only $30 (fees included).? Normal price after February 17 is $40. Box lunch is provided with your registration, but breakfast and hot drinks will not be served.
